name: places/ChIJqUXnQwn2wokRVR7Zo84AzV0
formattedAddress: 1751 Park Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1751 Park Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: I went to the health center for medical care at the Park Avenue location.  Although staff were friendly, I needed referrals for my medical conditions, and provided specific contact information from the facility waiting to receive the referral.  I did this on several occasions, called, and visited repeatedly, but kept being told that they will send a referral for several weeks at a time.  The pharmacy tried reaching  the doctor, or front desk staff by phone to facility to get prior authorization, but couldn't get a return call.  I tried reaching out to the doctor, and nurse, and front desk staff concerning this prescription, but was unsuccessful due to lack of return calls, and lack of staff member answering the phone in the medical clinic.  Staff members went on vacation, and still no one responded during my serious medical need, even despite the social worker advocating to the medical team, and sending emails to the medical team, and supervisors etc.  I was saddened by this lack of follow up, as I did not want to have to run all over town and change to a different primary care doctor, nor did I want to have my medical conditions advance due to serious neglect, and lack of follow through despite multiple attempts to obtain referrals, needed medicine, not even return call to myself nor the social worker who works within the same facility.  Sad, Sad, Sad!!

originalText.text: The people that work here are so very nice and welcoming. This is the first place that me and my partner have felt so welcomed and that our needs are being met.  Anisha was wonderful. Thanks Bailey House . Two thumbs up from us. Daniel and John Newton

originalText.text: Don't go thinking you can have a Covid test without being a client; even if you're a member of the community. I will never donate to this agency again.

text.text: Don't go thinking you can have a Covid test without being a client; even if you're a member of the community. I will never donate to this agency again.

originalText.text: Communication depends upon what person is assigned to your case. Israel Rivera was helpful bu I’m in a wheelchair, so why didn’t my packet go out to apts that are accessible? Leslie Campbell called me and spoke to me face to face about accesible housing and also said that 3 opportunities were available for me and my condition. I guess I have to wait because according to her “she’s in a training” so she cannot forward me appointments to meet who is looking forward to housing me

originalText.text: I just started their Housing program.The staff seem really nice.I attend about 2 groups a day.The groups are  interesting.I was told to be consistent and housing will be available  when the time comes.  Keeping  focus and consistent. Kevin K
